docs.title: 📖 How to Use this Manual
docs.text:
For your first reading it is important to go throw this manual sequentialy. The information in each section is built on the information presented in previous sections. You may miss something important if you skip around.

When information is presented in steps, use your system to dublicate each step as you read. Giving yourself this "hands-on" experience locks the information into your mind, thus reducing the need to refer to this manual later on.
